title: Santosa Wellness Center
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Raw, Thai, Western, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Wellness center offering accommodation, yoga, juice bar, and a restaurant that serves raw and vegan food. The only non-vegan items is honey. Offers pickup service within Kata and Karon area.
streetAddress: 16/4 -5 Patak Km.2 Rd, Tambol Karon, Amphoe Muang Phuket
